| MSSBP (Multiple Sclerosis-Specific Blood Pressure) |

In the paragraph, the terms "MSSBP" and "MSDBP" are used to refer to specific measures of blood pressure that are relevant to multiple sclerosis. These terms are not generic terms for diseases, but rather specific measures that are used to assess the effectiveness of treatments for multiple sclerosis.
